workshoptitle: Install and Configure Oracle Database 23c Free

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This is an introduction to installing and exploring the Oracle Database 23c Free

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Application Development
tutorials.description: APplication Development in the Oracle Database

tutorials.title: Lab: JSON Duality Views
tutorials.description: Building Duality Views

tutorials.title: Lab: Property Graphs
tutorials.description: Building Property Graphs

tutorials.title: Lab: SQL Domains
tutorials.description: Using SQL Domains

tutorials.title: Lab: Annotations
tutorials.description: Creating Annotations

tutorials.title: Lab: JavaScript Stored Procedures
tutorials.description: Using JavaScript Stored Procedures

tutorials.title: Lab: JSON Schema
tutorials.description: Creating JSON Schemas

tutorials.title: High Availability
tutorials.description: Creating JSON Schemas

tutorials.title: Security
tutorials.description: Security in 23c

tutorials.title: Lab: SQL Firewall
tutorials.description: Fortify your database security with SQL Firewall, protecting against unauthorized access and potential threats.

tutorials.title: Lab: Schema Level Privileges
tutorials.description: Gain insights into schema-level privileges management, enhancing control and security at a granular level.

tutorials.title: Lab: Read-Only Users
tutorials.description: Explore the implementation of read-only user accounts for secure data access without modification permissions.

tutorials.title: Lab: Developer Role
tutorials.description: Establish and configure a dedicated developer role, streamlining development activities within the database.

tutorials.title: Lab: Shrink Tablespace
tutorials.description: Optimize your database storage by mastering the technique of shrinking tablespaces efficiently.

tutorials.title: Lab: Error Message Improvements
tutorials.description: Enhance user experience and troubleshooting by implementing improved error messages in your SQL environment.

tutorials.title: Lab: SQL Analysis Report and Hint Reporting
tutorials.description: Learn to generate comprehensive SQL analysis reports and leverage hint reporting for performance optimization.

tutorials.title: Lab: Real-Time SQL Plan Management
tutorials.description: Implement real-time SQL plan management for dynamic optimization of query execution plans.

tutorials.title: SQL Enhancements
tutorials.description: SQL Enhancements in the Oracle Database

tutorials.title: Lab: Boolean
tutorials.description: Embrace the Boolean data type in SQL for a more straightforward and efficient representation of truth values.

tutorials.title: Lab: IF Exists for DDL
tutorials.description: Simplify data definition language operations with the introduction of conditional logic using 'IF Exists.'

tutorials.title: Lab: New Table Value Clause
tutorials.description: Explore the advantages of the new table value clause in SQL for enhanced data manipulation capabilities.

tutorials.title: Lab: Direct Joins for Updates and Deletes
tutorials.description: Optimize update and delete operations by employing direct joins for increased efficiency.

tutorials.title: Lab: Remove Requirement for Dual
tutorials.description: Streamline your SQL queries by eliminating the requirement for the dual table, simplifying database interactions.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Template to link to Need Help lab at the end of workshop. Change 'CHANGE-ME' in link below to need-help-livelabs.md or need-help-freetier.md
